Module roborally
Package game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
server.User
game.Player
public class Player
extends User
This class extends user to specify different Attributes for a player.
Author:
janau, annika

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(User user)
      Constructor for a player object on the serverside which is connected with an user. It is possible to message() the player.
      Parameters:
      user - User to create a player from

    • Player

      public Player​(PlayerAdded message)
      Constructor to create a player on the clientside. Used as a data structure to store received information about each player which can be displayed on the view.
      Parameters:
      message - Received PlayerAdded message to create a player from

  • Method Details

    • createRegister

      public void createRegister()
      Creates 5 empty registers.

    • resetDecks

      public void resetDecks()

    • reuseDiscardedDeck

      public void reuseDiscardedDeck()
      used in ProgrammingPhase. If the DrawProgrammingDeck is empty the discarded pile gets flipped and shuffled and can be used to draw cards again.

    • discardCards

      public void discardCards​(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards, DiscardDeck discardDeck)
      Lets you discard an Array of cards to a specified deck
      Parameters:
      cards - that should be discarded
      discardDeck - deck the cards should be discarded to

    • setRegisterCards

      public void setRegisterCards​(int register, Card card)
      saves the assigned Card for the stated register (1 - 5)
      Parameters:
      register - addressed register
      card - assigned card

    • getRegisterCard

      public Card getRegisterCard​(int register)
      returns the card that is saved to the given register (1-5)
      Parameters:
      register - that includes the card
      Returns:
      the card in the register
